# shadcnagents — Full Stack Listing

> Copy-paste Vercel AI SDK components and agent patterns for Next.js. Built with AI SDK v6, shadcn/ui, React 19, Tailwind v4, and TypeScript.

Website: https://shadcnagents.com
GitHub: https://github.com/shadcnagents/ui
Twitter: https://x.com/shadcnagents

## Installation

Install any stack with one command:
```
npx shadcn@latest add https://shadcnagents.com/r/<stack-name>.json
```

Each stack is a full vertical slice — UI component, API route, types, and all dependencies wired together.

---

## Foundations (9 stacks)

Core Vercel AI SDK methods with interactive previews.

### generateText()

- **Generate Text** (free) — Basic text generation with AI models
  URL: https://shadcnagents.com/stacks/basics-generate-text
  Install: `npx shadcn@latest add https://shadcnagents.com/r/basics-generate-text.json`

- **Multi-Model** (free) — Compare responses across GPT-4o, Claude, and Gemini
  URL: https://shadcnagents.com/stacks/basics-generate-text-multi-model
  Install: `npx shadcn@latest add https://shadcnagents.com/r/basics-generate-text-multi-model.json`

- **Prompt Engineering** (free) — System prompts and temperature control
  URL: https://shadcnagents.com/stacks/basics-generate-text-prompt
  Install: `npx shadcn@latest add https://shadcnagents.com/r/basics-generate-text-prompt.json`

### streamText()

- **Stream Text** (free) — Real-time token streaming
  URL: https://shadcnagents.com/stacks/basics-stream-text
  Install: `npx shadcn@latest add https://shadcnagents.com/r/basics-stream-text.json`

### generateImage()

- **Generate Image** (free) — AI image creation
  URL: https://shadcnagents.com/stacks/basics-generate-image
  Install: `npx shadcn@latest add https://shadcnagents.com/r/basics-generate-image.json`

### generateSpeech()

- **Generate Speech** (free) — AI speech synthesis
  URL: https://shadcnagents.com/stacks/basics-generate-speech
  Install: `npx shadcn@latest add https://shadcnagents.com/r/basics-generate-speech.json`

### transcribe()

- **Transcribe Audio** (free) — Audio transcription
  URL: https://shadcnagents.com/stacks/basics-transcribe
  Install: `npx shadcn@latest add https://shadcnagents.com/r/basics-transcribe.json`

### tool()

- **Tool Calling** (free) — Define and execute tools with AI models
  URL: https://shadcnagents.com/stacks/basics-tool
  Install: `npx shadcn@latest add https://shadcnagents.com/r/basics-tool.json`

### Agent

- **Agent Setup** (free) — Basic agent with tool calling loop
  URL: https://shadcnagents.com/stacks/basics-agent
  Install: `npx shadcn@latest add https://shadcnagents.com/r/basics-agent.json`

---

## Agent Architecture (10 stacks)

Advanced agent patterns — routing, orchestration, evaluation, and human-in-the-loop flows.

- **Routing Pattern** (free) — Route prompts to specialized agents
  URL: https://shadcnagents.com/stacks/ai-agents-routing
  Install: `npx shadcn@latest add https://shadcnagents.com/r/ai-agents-routing.json`

- **Orchestrator-Worker** (pro) — Central orchestrator delegates to worker agents
  URL: https://shadcnagents.com/stacks/ai-chat-agent-orchestrator-pattern

- **Sub-Agent Orchestrator** (pro) — Hierarchical multi-agent orchestration
  URL: https://shadcnagents.com/stacks/sub-agent-orchestrator

- **Tool Approval Basic** (free) — Human-in-the-loop tool approval flow
  URL: https://shadcnagents.com/stacks/ai-human-in-the-loop
  Install: `npx shadcn@latest add https://shadcnagents.com/r/ai-human-in-the-loop.json`

- **Context Builder** (pro) — Agentic context building with human approval
  URL: https://shadcnagents.com/stacks/ai-human-in-the-loop-agentic-context-builder

- **Needs Approval** (pro) — Tool approval pattern for chat agents
  URL: https://shadcnagents.com/stacks/ai-chat-agent-tool-approval

- **Inquire Multi-Choice** (pro) — Agent asks user multiple-choice questions
  URL: https://shadcnagents.com/stacks/ai-human-in-the-loop-inquire-multiple-choice

- **Inquire Text Input** (pro) — Agent asks user for text input
  URL: https://shadcnagents.com/stacks/ai-human-in-the-loop-inquire-text

- **Evaluator-Optimizer** (pro) — Self-improving agent with evaluation loop
  URL: https://shadcnagents.com/stacks/ai-chat-agent-evaluator-optimizer-pattern

- **Multi-Step Tools** (pro) — Agent executes multi-step tool sequences
  URL: https://shadcnagents.com/stacks/ai-chat-agent-multi-step-tool-pattern

- **Parallel Processing** (free) — Run multiple AI tasks in parallel
  URL: https://shadcnagents.com/stacks/ai-agents-parallel-processing
  Install: `npx shadcn@latest add https://shadcnagents.com/r/ai-agents-parallel-processing.json`

---

## Starter Apps (8 stacks)

Full application examples with complete UI and backend.

- **Chat-Base Clone** (pro) — Full chat application starter
  URL: https://shadcnagents.com/stacks/examples-chat-base-clone

- **Form Generator** (pro) — AI-powered form generation
  URL: https://shadcnagents.com/stacks/examples-form-generator

- **Data Analysis Agent** (pro) — Agent that analyzes data sets
  URL: https://shadcnagents.com/stacks/example-agent-data-analysis

- **Branding Agent** (pro) — AI branding assistant
  URL: https://shadcnagents.com/stacks/example-agent-branding

- **Competitor Research** (pro) — AI competitor analysis agent
  URL: https://shadcnagents.com/stacks/example-agent-competitor

- **SEO Audit Agent** (pro) — AI SEO auditing tool
  URL: https://shadcnagents.com/stacks/example-agent-seo-audit

- **Reddit Validation** (pro) — Validate ideas via Reddit analysis
  URL: https://shadcnagents.com/stacks/example-agent-reddit-validation

- **A11y Audit Agent** (pro) — Accessibility auditing agent
  URL: https://shadcnagents.com/stacks/example-agent-a11y-audit

---

## Rich Output (11 stacks)

Structured and visual AI output — tables, charts, JSON renders, canvas, and more.

- **Table Editor** (free) — AI-generated editable tables
  URL: https://shadcnagents.com/stacks/ai-artifact-table
  Install: `npx shadcn@latest add https://shadcnagents.com/r/ai-artifact-table.json`

- **Chart Generation** (free) — AI-generated charts and visualizations
  URL: https://shadcnagents.com/stacks/ai-artifact-chart
  Install: `npx shadcn@latest add https://shadcnagents.com/r/ai-artifact-chart.json`

- **JSON Render Shadcn** (pro) — Render JSON as shadcn/ui components
  URL: https://shadcnagents.com/stacks/json-render-shadcn

- **JSON Render Generate** (pro) — Generate UI from JSON schema
  URL: https://shadcnagents.com/stacks/json-render-generate

- **JSON Render PDF** (pro) — Render JSON as PDF documents
  URL: https://shadcnagents.com/stacks/json-render-pdf

- **JSON Render Remotion** (pro) — Render JSON as Remotion videos
  URL: https://shadcnagents.com/stacks/json-render-remotion

- **Streaming Markdown** (free) — Real-time markdown rendering from AI stream
  URL: https://shadcnagents.com/stacks/streaming-markdown-renderer
  Install: `npx shadcn@latest add https://shadcnagents.com/r/streaming-markdown-renderer.json`

- **Artifact Canvas** (pro) — Interactive canvas for AI-generated content
  URL: https://shadcnagents.com/stacks/artifact-canvas

- **AI Image Output** (free) — Display AI-generated images
  URL: https://shadcnagents.com/stacks/ai-image-output
  Install: `npx shadcn@latest add https://shadcnagents.com/r/ai-image-output.json`

- **Structured Output** (pro) — Typed structured output viewer
  URL: https://shadcnagents.com/stacks/structured-output-viewer

- **Web Preview** (pro) — Sandboxed web preview of AI-generated code
  URL: https://shadcnagents.com/stacks/web-preview-sandbox

---

## Connectors (8 stacks)

Web search, scraping, and document processing tools.

- **Claude Web Search** (free) — Web search using Claude's built-in tool
  URL: https://shadcnagents.com/stacks/tool-websearch-claude
  Install: `npx shadcn@latest add https://shadcnagents.com/r/tool-websearch-claude.json`

- **Exa Web Search** (free) — Web search using Exa API
  URL: https://shadcnagents.com/stacks/tool-websearch-exa
  Install: `npx shadcn@latest add https://shadcnagents.com/r/tool-websearch-exa.json`

- **Exa Labs Search** (pro) — Advanced Exa search with labs features
  URL: https://shadcnagents.com/stacks/tool-websearch-exa-2

- **Firecrawl Scraper** (pro) — Web scraping with Firecrawl
  URL: https://shadcnagents.com/stacks/tool-websearch-firecrawl

- **Cheerio Scraper** (free) — Lightweight web scraping with Cheerio
  URL: https://shadcnagents.com/stacks/cheerio-scraper
  Install: `npx shadcn@latest add https://shadcnagents.com/r/cheerio-scraper.json`

- **Jina AI Scraper** (free) — Web scraping with Jina AI reader
  URL: https://shadcnagents.com/stacks/jina-scraper
  Install: `npx shadcn@latest add https://shadcnagents.com/r/jina-scraper.json`

- **Markdown Scraper** (pro) — Convert web pages to clean markdown
  URL: https://shadcnagents.com/stacks/markdown-new-scraper

- **PDF Analysis** (free) — Extract and analyze PDF documents
  URL: https://shadcnagents.com/stacks/ai-pdf-ingest
  Install: `npx shadcn@latest add https://shadcnagents.com/r/ai-pdf-ingest.json`

---

## Pipelines (7 stacks)

Multi-step AI workflows and prompt pipelines.

- **URL Analysis** (free) — Basic workflow analyzing URLs
  URL: https://shadcnagents.com/stacks/ai-workflow-basic
  Install: `npx shadcn@latest add https://shadcnagents.com/r/ai-workflow-basic.json`

- **Sequential Workflow** (pro) — Step-by-step sequential pipeline
  URL: https://shadcnagents.com/stacks/wdk-workflows-sequential

- **Evaluator Workflow** (pro) — Self-evaluating pipeline
  URL: https://shadcnagents.com/stacks/wdk-workflows-evaluator

- **Orchestrator Workflow** (pro) — Multi-agent orchestrator pipeline
  URL: https://shadcnagents.com/stacks/wdk-workflows-orchestrator

- **Parallel Review** (pro) — Parallel review pipeline
  URL: https://shadcnagents.com/stacks/wdk-workflows-parallel

- **Routing Workflow** (pro) — Route-based workflow pipeline
  URL: https://shadcnagents.com/stacks/wdk-workflows-routing

- **Few-Shot Editor** (pro) — Few-shot prompt engineering editor
  URL: https://shadcnagents.com/stacks/ai-sdk-prompt-few-shot

---

## Chat Kit (20 stacks)

Chat interfaces, input components, and display elements.

### Chat Interfaces

- **Basic Chat** (free) — Minimal chat interface
  URL: https://shadcnagents.com/stacks/ai-elements-chat
  Install: `npx shadcn@latest add https://shadcnagents.com/r/ai-elements-chat.json`

- **ChatGPT Clone** (pro) — Full ChatGPT-style interface
  URL: https://shadcnagents.com/stacks/chat-gpt

- **Claude Clone** (pro) — Full Claude-style interface
  URL: https://shadcnagents.com/stacks/chat-claude

- **Grok Clone** (pro) — Full Grok-style interface
  URL: https://shadcnagents.com/stacks/chat-grok

### Display Elements

- **Reasoning Display** (free) — Show AI reasoning/thinking process
  URL: https://shadcnagents.com/stacks/ai-elements-reasoning-chat
  Install: `npx shadcn@latest add https://shadcnagents.com/r/ai-elements-reasoning-chat.json`

- **Sources & Citations** (free) — Display sources with citations
  URL: https://shadcnagents.com/stacks/ai-elements-sources-chat
  Install: `npx shadcn@latest add https://shadcnagents.com/r/ai-elements-sources-chat.json`

- **Inline Citations** (pro) — Inline citation annotations
  URL: https://shadcnagents.com/stacks/ai-elements-inline-citation

- **Plan Display** (free) — Show AI execution plan steps
  URL: https://shadcnagents.com/stacks/ai-elements-plan
  Install: `npx shadcn@latest add https://shadcnagents.com/r/ai-elements-plan.json`

- **Tool Approval** (free) — Confirm tool execution in chat
  URL: https://shadcnagents.com/stacks/ai-elements-confirmation
  Install: `npx shadcn@latest add https://shadcnagents.com/r/ai-elements-confirmation.json`

- **Queue Display** (free) — Display queued AI tasks
  URL: https://shadcnagents.com/stacks/ai-elements-queue
  Install: `npx shadcn@latest add https://shadcnagents.com/r/ai-elements-queue.json`

### Input Components

- **AI Prompt Input** (free) — Rich prompt input field
  URL: https://shadcnagents.com/stacks/ai-prompt-input
  Install: `npx shadcn@latest add https://shadcnagents.com/r/ai-prompt-input.json`

- **Voice Input Button** (pro) — Voice-to-text input button
  URL: https://shadcnagents.com/stacks/voice-input-button

- **Model Selector** (free) — AI model picker dropdown
  URL: https://shadcnagents.com/stacks/model-selector
  Install: `npx shadcn@latest add https://shadcnagents.com/r/model-selector.json`

- **Token Counter** (pro) — Real-time token count display
  URL: https://shadcnagents.com/stacks/token-counter

- **Prompt Suggestions** (free) — Clickable prompt suggestion pills
  URL: https://shadcnagents.com/stacks/prompt-suggestion-pills
  Install: `npx shadcn@latest add https://shadcnagents.com/r/prompt-suggestion-pills.json`

- **Multimodal Upload** (pro) — File and image upload for AI chat
  URL: https://shadcnagents.com/stacks/multimodal-file-upload

### Chat Features

- **History Sidebar** (pro) — Conversation history sidebar
  URL: https://shadcnagents.com/stacks/conversation-history-sidebar

- **Message Branch** (pro) — Branch and navigate message threads
  URL: https://shadcnagents.com/stacks/message-branch-navigator

- **AI Loading States** (free) — Animated loading indicators for AI responses
  URL: https://shadcnagents.com/stacks/ai-loading-states
  Install: `npx shadcn@latest add https://shadcnagents.com/r/ai-loading-states.json`

- **Token Stream Effect** (pro) — Animated token streaming visual effect
  URL: https://shadcnagents.com/stacks/ai-token-stream

---

## Landing Blocks (12 stacks)

Marketing UI components for AI product pages.

- **Code Block 1** (free) — Feature section with code preview
  URL: https://shadcnagents.com/stacks/marketing-feature-code-block-1
  Install: `npx shadcn@latest add https://shadcnagents.com/r/marketing-feature-code-block-1.json`

- **Code Block 2** (free) — Feature section with code preview (variant)
  URL: https://shadcnagents.com/stacks/marketing-feature-code-block-2
  Install: `npx shadcn@latest add https://shadcnagents.com/r/marketing-feature-code-block-2.json`

- **Code Block 3** (free) — Feature section with code preview (variant)
  URL: https://shadcnagents.com/stacks/marketing-feature-code-block-3
  Install: `npx shadcn@latest add https://shadcnagents.com/r/marketing-feature-code-block-3.json`

- **Feature Grid** (pro) — Grid layout for feature showcases
  URL: https://shadcnagents.com/stacks/marketing-feature-grid-1

- **Bento Layout** (free) — Bento grid for marketing pages
  URL: https://shadcnagents.com/stacks/marketing-bento-1
  Install: `npx shadcn@latest add https://shadcnagents.com/r/marketing-bento-1.json`

- **Model Comparison** (pro) — Side-by-side model comparison
  URL: https://shadcnagents.com/stacks/marketing-model-comparison

- **Comparison Compact** (pro) — Compact model comparison card
  URL: https://shadcnagents.com/stacks/marketing-model-comparison-compact

- **Comparison Table** (pro) — Detailed model comparison table
  URL: https://shadcnagents.com/stacks/marketing-model-comparison-table-1

- **Integration Showcase** (pro) — Integration logos and cards
  URL: https://shadcnagents.com/stacks/marketing-integrations-1

- **Integrations Circle** (pro) — Circular integration display
  URL: https://shadcnagents.com/stacks/marketing-integrations-2

- **ROI Calculator** (pro) — Interactive AI ROI calculator
  URL: https://shadcnagents.com/stacks/marketing-calculator-agent-roi

- **Changelog** (pro) — Product changelog component
  URL: https://shadcnagents.com/stacks/marketing-changelog-1

---

## Supported AI Providers

Works with any Vercel AI SDK-compatible provider:
- OpenAI (GPT-4o, GPT-4, GPT-3.5)
- Anthropic (Claude Sonnet 4, Claude Haiku)
- Google (Gemini Pro, Gemini Flash)
- Groq
- Mistral
- Any custom AI SDK provider

## Links

- Website: https://shadcnagents.com
- Documentation: https://shadcnagents.com/docs
- Pricing: https://shadcnagents.com/pricing
- GitHub: https://github.com/shadcnagents/ui
- Twitter: https://x.com/shadcnagents
